item.title: Compiling error...(sorry for posting here - i know where this belongs)
item.dc:creator: @brynpttrsn brynpttrsn
item.description:
@brynpttrsn wrote:

Well… the first error you had was a syntax error. This new error is just saying that it cant find the method inGPK()… I don’t know what this method is supposed to do nor do I desire to go and find it. I’m just assuming that you found this snippet of code from a tutorial or from another server. If you found it from another server you can just copy the method from that server. Otherwise your on your own to find it. If all else fails… you could just delete the isGPK() portion of the if statement.

Read full topic

And when i remove 1 “)” it gives me a new error that i posted here before…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2009, 11:11:28 pm[/size][hr]yes, the error was on line 16554 and, i fixed it i just forgot to add there “absX, absY, 1” inside the ()

item.title: Compiling error...(sorry for posting here - i know where this belongs)
item.dc:creator: @laveerre laveerre
item.description:
@laveerre wrote:

i tried that and it gave me this error:

client.java:16554: cannot find symbol
symbol : method inGPK()
location: class client
if(isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) == false && !isInPitGame() && !isInCastleWars()
&& !inGPK()){

 ^

Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Finished!
Jatka painamalla mitä tahansa näppäintä . . .

I will now check the line it says, 16554… but i don’t think the problem is there…

item.title: Compiling error...(sorry for posting here - i know where this belongs)
item.dc:creator: @laveerre laveerre
item.description:
@laveerre wrote:

client.java:7013: illegal start of expression
&& autocasting && autocastID > 0 && (isI
nPitGame() && !AttackingOn2.isInPitRoom() || isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) == tr
ue && AttackingOn2.isInWilderness(AttackingOn2.absX, AttackingOn2.absY, 1) == tr
ue || inGPK(absX, absY, 1) == true && AttackingOn2.inGPK(AttackingOn2.absX, Atta
ckingOn2.absY, 1) == true))) {

                       ^

1 error
Finished!
Jatka painamalla mitä tahansa näppäintä . . .

What have i done wrong when that row it points to is like this :

	for (int element : staffs) {
		if ((playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == element)
				&& autocasting && autocastID > 0 && (isInPitGame() && !AttackingOn2.isInPitRoom() || isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) == true && AttackingOn2.isInWilderness(AttackingOn2.absX, AttackingOn2.absY, 1) == true || inGPK(absX, absY, 1) == true && AttackingOn2.inGPK(AttackingOn2.absX, AttackingOn2.absY, 1) == true))) {
